* S/N: N/A

=== Current Issues ===
Edgy:
* The Sleep function works, but it refuses to resume
* Hibernate just doesn't work alltogether
* In order for Ubuntu to see the hard drive (like when you want to install it) the parameter "acpi=force irqpoll" must be added 
* to avoid the pesky irq trap b0 messages in dmesg, you need to add "pci=nomsi" (which I found had a significant affect on performance)

Feisty:
* Dell 1390 (Broadcom 4311) works, but requires fwcutter to get the firmware, and is limited to 11 mbps. Ndiswrapper can be used for full funtionality 
* Changing brightness with keyboard shortcuts doesn't work. 

Interpid:
* Very very rarely the Broadcom STA wireless driver doesnt load on cold start, reboot fixes it.
* Use fglrx for <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/298675|AltGr-Fix]]</nowiki>
